pilots.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
pilots.caption: Spectre-4
pilots.ability: While you defend, [Critical] results are neutralized before [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Captain Rex
pilots.caption: Clone Wars Veteran
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, assign the Suppressive Fire condition to the defender.

pilots.name: Ezra Bridger
pilots.caption: Spectre-6
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Sabine Wren
pilots.caption: Spectre-5
pilots.ability: Before you activate, you may perform a (barrel roll) or (boost) action.
